HERO_SUBTITLE: Construction and Installation of Padel Courts and Canopies Worldwide
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: Based in Spain, Portico Sport is one of the leading Padel courts & canopies manufacturer globally. The company counts with 15 yrs. track record in the sector, presence in over 40 countries and +3,000 courts installed.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Portico Sport stands for quality and excellence in customer service. Our engineering DNA enable us to be manufacturer with a complete turnkey offering combining courts and canopies with 100% in-house design and manufacturing.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: In 2023 the company inaugurated a new manufacturing site expanding over 110k sqft making it the largest and most technologically advanced in the industry.
BENTO_CONTENT_1: With over 13 years of experience in managing large projects across five continents, we have developed an international commercial network in each area to provide the best service to every client.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: In our commitment to innovation, Portico Sport offers the best design and quality in our courts and canopies, with record delivery times and full warranties. We provide padel courts and canopies with maximum strength and durability.
BENTO_SUBTITLE_3: Padel courts that comply with regulations
BENTO_CONTENT_3: Designed and developed by engineering department of PORTICO SPORT for the practice of padel at the highest level, our courts comply with the official sports regulations (NIDE 2004 Padel), the regulations and standards of the FIP (International Padel Federation) and structural calculation based on the Standard «Structural Steel Instruction (EAE)» and American Code: AISC-360 AND ASCE SEI 7-16-. All our courts come with a 10-year guarantee (structural stability).
BENTO_CONTENT_4: As an engineering firm, Portico Sport provides a comprehensive construction process from start to finish, with a team of specialized professionals who guide you through every step, recognizing that each project is unique.
PREFOOTER_SUBTITLE: The largest padel courts and canopies manufacturing site
CONTACT_SUBTITLE: A great team of professionals at your service

INFO_TITLE_1: Un reconocimiento único para creadores, creadoras y comunidades
INFO_CONTENT_1_1: Los Premios ESLAND son una iniciativa privada promovida por el célebre streamer TheGrefg y buscan apoyar y reconocer la creación de contenido en el ámbito hispanohablante.
INFO_CONTENT_1_2: ESLAND es el acrónimo de ESPAÑA, LATINOAMÉRICA Y ANDORRA, tres localizaciones geográficas que comparten el idioma que las une más allá de cualquier frontera, ya sea física o virtual.
INFO_CONTENT_2_1: El trofeo que se entrega a los ganadores y ganadoras en la ceremonia es una representación de la letra “A” dividida en tres fragmentos y ensambladas a modo de artilugio futurista sobre el que se construye la narrativa del evento.
INFO_CONTENT_2_2: Un artefacto de origen desconocido que dota de herramientas y habilidades para la creación. Una metáfora sobre la emancipación del talento gracias a la tecnología y la irrupción de los creadores de contenido en el mundo del entretenimiento.

POLICIES.TITLE: Cookies policy

POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_2: This Website uses third-party cookies, specifically Google Analytics analytical cookies, to analyse the activity carried out by users when they visit the website for statistical purposes.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: You can accept all cookies, reject them or configure your preferences in the cookie settings panel. At any time you can revoke consent or modify your cookie settings preferences by accessing the configuration panel again. You can also prevent the download of cookies or delete those installed through your browser settings, preventing cookies from being stored on your device. It is very important that you read this cookie policy.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_4: We inform you of the possibility of rejecting and disabling cookies may affect or hinder navigation or the provision of services offered on this Website.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What are cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are alphanumeric identifiers that contain information that is installed on the User's device and downloaded to the User's Web browser when the User visits and accesses a web page. Their main purpose is to uniquely identify and recognize the User's device each time he or she accesses the Website, as well as to improve the quality and offer a better use of the Website.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: They are small text files that are stored on the hard drive of the computer and serve to identify the User when he or she connects to the website again. Their purpose is to record the User's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and frequent on the web as they allow pages to function more efficiently and obtain greater personalization and analysis of the User's behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: What types of cookies are there?
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1.- According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: Own cookies are those that are installed on the User's terminal from the domain managed by the person responsible for the Website and third-party cookies are those that are installed on the User's terminal from a domain managed by third parties that process the data obtained through such cookies.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2.- According to the length of time they remain active:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies are those that remain active and collect data while the user accesses a website and disappear when the session ends, and permanent cookies are those that remain active and from which data is collected for a period of time defined by the person responsible for the cookie or until they are deactivated or deleted by the User.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: They are those that allow the User to navigate through a web page and use the different options or services offered, such as, control traffic and data communication, identify the session, access restricted access parts, make a request for registration, use security elements during navigation, etc. As they are necessary for the operation of the website, these cookies will be activated and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: This type of Cookie remembers your preferences in browsing the Web so that you do not have to reconfigure the service each time you visit the Web. By way of example, this type includes: Volume settings for video or sound players. Video transmission speeds that are compatible with your browser. These cookies can be disabled by the User, although this may affect the proper functioning of the Web services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: They are those that allow the tracking and analysis of the behavior of the Users of the Web in order to obtain statistical data and improve the operation of the Web. Each time a User visits a Web, a tool from an external provider generates an analytical cookie on the User's computer.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: This type of cookies allows to obtain information about the duration or frequency of visualization of advertising positions, the interaction with them, or the navigation patterns and/or behaviors of the User since they help to shape an advertising interest profile. In this way, they allow to offer advertising related to the interests of the User.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_7: They are those that allow the User to interact with the content of different social platforms (Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.) and that are generated only for the Users of said social networks. The conditions of use of these cookies and the information collected are regulated by the privacy policy of the corresponding social platform.

BLOCK.TITLE: How to block or delete cookies?
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: You can allow, block or delete the cookies installed on your computer by configuring the options of the browser installed on your computer. If you do not allow the installation of cookies in your browser, you may not be able to access some of the services and your experience on our website may be less satisfactory.

INFO.PROJECTS_TEXT: A selection of projects that coming into reality

COURT1.TITLE: Mobile court patented by Portico Sport
COURT1.DESCRIPTION: Designed and calculated by our Engineering department, the client saves on labor and foundation costs. This court model is made with support plates that do not require anchoring to the ground, allowing the sport to be transported to any location. Only a draining surface is needed to prevent water accumulation. It can be played in a specific location for an extended period or easily moved to another place.
COURT1.IMAGE_ALT: Mobile court patented by Portico Sport

COURT2.TITLE: Panoramic FLOW
COURT2.DESCRIPTION: The Panoramic Flow court is an enhanced version of our Panoramic court. Designed by Portico Sport's engineering department, this court model eliminates the corners of the metal structure, allowing the continuous high-strength glass walls to provide an unobstructed panoramic view of the surroundings. This magnificent design, coupled with meticulous aesthetics, makes this court the most attractive for those who want their spectators to enjoy an unparalleled padel experience.

COURT3.TITLE: Panoramic
COURT3.DESCRIPTION: Our panoramic court is an extraordinary and thrilling choice for padel enthusiasts. Designed and manufactured by Portico Sport's engineering department, this court model features high-strength glass walls that provide a panoramic view of the surroundings, creating a unique and exciting playing experience both inside and outside the court. Due to its visual appeal, this court is increasingly sought-after by customers aiming to offer a distinctive gaming experience to all their players.

COURT4.TITLE: Club
COURT4.DESCRIPTION: One of our most sought-after courts, the Club Court, stands out as an ideal option for those seeking superior quality and exceptional durability. With pillars measuring 3 meters in height, this court is designed and manufactured by Portico Sport's engineering department to provide an optimal environment for high-level padel practice, ensuring the highest quality standards. If you're looking for a padel court that combines durability and resistance, the Club Court is an excellent choice.

COURT5.TITLE: Club Plus
COURT5.DESCRIPTION: The Club Plus Court is an evolution of our Club Court. This enhanced court maintains the same premium quality while providing increased durability, thanks to its superior structures designed by Portico Sport's engineering department. These structures are built to withstand high wind gusts and adverse weather conditions. In the Club Plus Court, you'll find seamlessly integrated durability and high resistance for an unparalleled padel practice experience.

COURT6.TITLE: Ultra 64
COURT6.DESCRIPTION: Our Ultra 64 court is one of the most resilient padel courts in the market. Designed by specialized engineers at Portico Sport, this court's structure features a unique design of buttresses and anchoring, enabling it to withstand winds of up to 64 m/s. The combination of its distinctive design with superior-quality materials makes it a highly robust and durable court, ideal for areas with adverse weather conditions. If you're seeking an extremely sturdy and long-lasting padel court, the Ultra 64 court is the perfect choice.

COURT7.TITLE: Force 80
COURT7.DESCRIPTION: Our Force 80 court stands out as one of the most resilient padel courts on the market. Designed by Portico Sport's engineers, this court's structure features a superior design of buttresses and a special anchoring system, enabling it to withstand hurricane-force winds of up to 80 m/s. The combination of its original design with top-quality materials makes it the sturdiest and most durable court, ideal for areas with extremely adverse weather conditions. If you want to enjoy padel regardless of the challenging weather, the Force 80 court is an excellent choice.

COURT8.TITLE: Single
COURT8.DESCRIPTION: Our Single Court is perfect for a solo player and is specially designed by Portico Sport's engineering department. With dimensions smaller than usual (20x6m), this court is intended to provide a great playing experience for those who play alone, whether for training, enjoyment, or due to a lack of a partner for the sport. Despite its smaller size, it features the same premium quality and exceptional durability as the rest of our courts, making it a great choice for clubs looking to expand their offerings and provide this special court.

COURT9.TITLE: Mini
COURT9.DESCRIPTION: Our Mini Court is a reduced-size padel court (10.47x5.47m) with a lowered height (1m), ideal for smaller spaces, home practice, or younger players. Designed by Portico Sport's engineering department, this court is manufactured with the same premium-quality materials as the rest of our padel courts. Despite being the smallest court, it offers the same stability, durability, and resistance. If you're looking for a compact padel court, the Mini Court is an excellent choice.
